Html:
Is there a way to put a video in DEPTH-MAP MONO.
If not. Can you add DEPTH-MAP MONO
There only seems to be over and under and side by side.

Hi demow12,

The depth map effect is used to generate a second image based on each pixel distance from the camera.
A mono depth map would simply take the original image and duplicate for each eye, ignoring the depthmap information..
Is that the behavior you are looking for?

-Stephane

I'm not entirely sure what you mean and i not entirely sure on how to explain what im looking for.
I want to have the Depth map effect with a non-3d video file.
When i use the depth map effect with a none 3d video file.
It gives the none 3d video a slight 3d effect.
But the image is back to front and unorganized and unwatchable.

I'm not entirely sure what you mean and i not entirely sure on how to explain what im looking for.
I want to have the Depth map effect with a non-3d video file.
When i use the depth map effect with a none 3d video file.
It gives the none 3d video a slight 3d effect.
But the image is back to front and unorganized and unwatchable.

Can you send me a screenshot of your video file? This will help me to understand and I should be able to tell you if the format is supported or not.

Regards,

-Stephane

Its got nothing to do with the file format.
Im talking about putting a NON-3D video in the DEPTH MAP setting without it being all messed up like this--->
DEPTH MAP ENABLED side by side and over and under (It screws up NON-3d videos and makes it unwatchable)

DEPTH MAP DISABLED

I want to be able to use DEPTH MAP without the image being messing up like the first image i posted.
